alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 27 at 12:51PM MST until February 27 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TUESDAY TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the second High Wind Warning, west winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected through Thursday morning. West winds 60 to 75 mph with gusts up to 90 mph expected Thursday afternoon. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, until 10 PM CST /9 PM MST/ this evening. For the second High Wind Warning, from 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Tuesday to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
